Package fr.playsoft.android.tools.customcomponents

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EllipsizingTextView.EllipsizeListener
    Basic Interface returning OnEllipsizeStateChange listener call
    IUltraActivity
    Gloval Interface for AUltraActivity
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AUltraActivity
    Abstract class for FragmentActivity class.
    AUltraApplication
    Application class Holds basic methods which will help to run methods on UI Thread
    ElementCell
    Defines a single cell element to be used as parameter during creating of UltraListCell.
    ElementGallery
    Defines a single cell element to be used as parameter during creating of UltraGalleryCell.
    ElementSwipe
    Defines a single cell element to be used as parameter during creating of UltraSwipeCell.
    EllipsizingTextView
    Custom TextView with extended ellipsizing functions
    PullToUpdateList
    An UltraList implementation that uses "pull to update" mechanism.
    StripedView
    Class which creates a striped background for any View
    SwipeViewDescriptor
    Class which wraps all data needed to show UltraSwipe in UltraList
    UltraDualView
    Ultra Dual View is a fully customizable view similiar to youtube / facebook style
    UltraDualView.SavedState  
    UltraGallery
    Universal Gallery class
    UltraGalleryCell  
    UltraGestureDetector
    Universal Gesture Detector can be used on any view
    UltraGrid
    Universal grid to be used for various lists in the app.
    UltraGrid.ScrollInfo
    Class holding info about selected item and scroll offset.
    UltraGridCell
    Object representing single cell in UltraGrid.
    UltraList
    Universal list to be used for various lists in the app.
    UltraList.ScrollInfo
    Class holding info about selected item and scroll offset.
    UltraListCell
    Object representing single cell in UltraList.
    UltraListDocked
    UltraList with a custom "dockable" header inside it.
    UltraListTouch
    UltraList with drag&drop & slide to remove effects.
    UltraMultiSwipe
    UltraSwipe Swipeable view displaying Gallery look a like
    UltraSwipe
    UltraSwipe Swipeable view displaying Gallery look a like
    UltraSwipeCell
    Object representing single view in UltraSwipe
    UltraSwipeIndicator
    UltraSwipeIndicator View which shows all possible items and selected one, as a horizontal dot bar
    UltraSwipeListCell
    UltraList / UltraGridCell which implements UltraSwipe component
    UltraSwipeScroller
    Class which implements scroller in UltraSwipe It enables to operate the scrolling speed animation after fling
